## Quick Reference

| Tool | Language | Status | Purpose | Install |
|------|----------|--------|---------|---------|
| [Binx](binx.qmd) | Rust | [Experimental]{.status-experimental} | Fast polyploid CLI | [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/alex-sandercock/Binx/releases) |
| [BIGapp](bigapp.qmd) | R/Shiny | [Stable]{.status-stable} | Genomic analysis web app | `BiocManager::install("Breeding-Insight/BIGapp")` |
| [BIGr](bigr.qmd) | R | [Stable]{.status-stable} | Core genomic functions | `install.packages("BIGr")` |
| [castgen](castgen.qmd) | R | [Stable]{.status-stable} | Sample size estimation | `install.packages("castgen")` |
| [SimpleSnek](simplesnek.qmd) | Python | [Active]{.status-active} | GATK variant calling | Clone from GitHub |

## Requesting Features or Reporting Bugs

Please open an issue on the relevant GitHub repository. When reporting bugs, include:

1. A minimal reproducible example
2. Your operating system and software versions
3. The full error message
